title: How to pair Bluetooth Device
answer:
The Bluetooth pairing process allows you to establish trusted connections between your Sprint Phone Connect 3 to other Bluetooth devices.<o:p></o:p> 

 1. Press Menu > Bluetooth > Pair Device.<o:p></o:p> 

 2. Place mobile phone close to Sprint Phone Connect 3, and then search for Sprint Phone Connect<o:p></o:p> 

 3. Enter PIN code (0000) and confirm to connect on your mobile phone. Skip this step if you do not<o:p></o:p> 

 need enter PIN code.<o:p></o:p>
